text: Dirk Scalongne (12 December 1879 - 1 April 1973) was a Dutch fencer. He won a bronze medal in the team sabre event at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1879 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Dutch male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of the Netherlands Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Netherlands Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Royal Netherlands Navy submarine commanders Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam Category:Medalists at the 1912 Summer Olympics
title: Dirk Scalongne
